​ io.github.openbangla.keyboard ​ FSFAP ​ OpenBangla Keyboard ​ An OpenSource, Unicode compliant Bengali Input Method ​ ​
​ OpenBangla Keyboard is an OpenSource, Unicode compliant Bengali Input Method for GNU/Linux systems. It's a full fledged Bengali input method with typing automation tools, includes many famous typing methods such as Avro Phonetic, Probhat, Munir Optima, National (Jatiya) etc. ​ ​
​ Most of the features of Avro Keyboard are present in OpenBangla Keyboard. So Avro Keyboard users will feel at home with OpenBangla Keyboard in Linux. ​ ​ GPL-3.0-or-later ​ http://openbangla.github.io/ https://github.com/OpenBangla/OpenBangla-Keyboard/issues ​
